name: Baked String Beans
ingredients: 16 ounces frozen French-style green beans, thawed

instructions.en: Place thawed green beans in an ungreased 1 1/2-quart baking dish
instructions.sk: Vložte rozmrazené zelené fazuľky do nevymastenej 1,5 litrovej zapekacej misy
instructions.ja: 解凍したインゲン豆を油を引いていない1.5クォートの耐熱皿に入れる

instructions.en: Cook bacon until crisp, reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon grease and set bacon aside
instructions.sk: Opečte slaninu do chrumkava, odložte 1 polievkovú lyžicu slaniny a slaninu dajte bokom
instructions.ja: ベーコンをカリカリに焼き、ベーコンの脂大さじ1を取り分け、ベーコンは脇に置く

instructions.en: Dissolve beef bouillon in 1 cup of hot water
instructions.sk: Rozpustite hovädzí bujón v 1 šálke horúcej vody
instructions.ja: 1カップの熱湯でビーフブイヨンを溶かす

instructions.en: Add garlic salt and pepper to the bouillon mixture
instructions.sk: Pridajte cesnakovou soľ a korenie do bujónovej zmesi
instructions.ja: ブイヨン液にガーリックソルトとコショウを加える

instructions.en: Stir reserved bacon grease into the bouillon mixture
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte odloženú slaninovou masť do bujónovej zmesi
instructions.ja: 取り分けておいたベーコンの脂をブイヨン液に混ぜる

instructions.en: Pour bouillon mixture over green beans and stir well
instructions.sk: Nalejte bujónovú zmes na zelené fazuľky a dobre premiešajte
instructions.ja: ブイヨン液をインゲン豆にかけてよく混ぜる

instructions.en: Cover baking dish with aluminum foil
instructions.ja: 耐熱皿をアルミホイルで覆う

instructions.en: Crumble reserved bacon and sprinkle over the top just before serving
instructions.sk: Rozdrvte odloženú slaninu a posypte ňou vrch tesne pred podávaním
instructions.ja: 取り分けておいたベーコンを砕き、提供直前に上からかける
